amendment.description: To increase to $10,000,000 the threshold for major medical facility projects of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5129 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5129 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S10902; text: CR S10902) To increase to $10,000,000 the threshold for major medical facility projects of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5129 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Craig.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5129 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
